3066                         enqueuePackageUpdated(new PackageUpdatedTask(PackageUpdatedTask.OP_REMOVE,
3067                                 packagesRemoved.toArray(new String[packagesRemoved.size()]), user));
3068                     }
3069                 }
3070                 sPendingPackages.clear();
3071             }
3072         }
3073     }
3074 
3075     /**
3076      * Workaround to re-check unrestored items, in-case they were installed but the Package-ADD
3077      * runnable was missed by the launcher.
3078      */
3079     public void recheckRestoredItems(final Context context) {
3080         Runnable r = new Runnable() {
3081 
3082             @Override
3083             public void run() {
3084                 LauncherAppsCompat launcherApps = LauncherAppsCompat.getInstance(context);
3085                 HashSet<String> installedPackages = new HashSet<String>();
3086                 UserHandleCompat user = UserHandleCompat.myUserHandle();
3087                 synchronized(sBgLock) {
3088                     for (ItemInfo info : sBgItemsIdMap.values()) {
3089                         if (info instanceof ShortcutInfo) {
3090                             ShortcutInfo si = (ShortcutInfo) info;
3091                             if (si.isPromise() && si.getTargetComponent() != null
3092                                     && launcherApps.isPackageEnabledForProfile(
3093                                             si.getTargetComponent().getPackageName(), user)) {
3094                                 installedPackages.add(si.getTargetComponent().getPackageName());
3095                             }
3096                         } else if (info instanceof LauncherAppWidgetInfo) {
3097                             LauncherAppWidgetInfo widget = (LauncherAppWidgetInfo) info;
3098                             if (widget.hasRestoreFlag(LauncherAppWidgetInfo.FLAG_PROVIDER_NOT_READY)
3099                                     && launcherApps.isPackageEnabledForProfile(
3100                                             widget.providerName.getPackageName(), user)) {
3101                                 installedPackages.add(widget.providerName.getPackageName());
3102                             }
3103                         }
3104                     }
3105                 }
3106 
3107                 if (!installedPackages.isEmpty()) {
3108                     final ArrayList<AppInfo> restoredApps = new ArrayList<AppInfo>();
3109                     for (String pkg : installedPackages) {
3110                         for (LauncherActivityInfoCompat info : launcherApps.getActivityList(pkg, user)) {
3111                             restoredApps.add(new AppInfo(context, info, user, mIconCache, null));
3112                         }
3113                     }
3114 
3115                     final Callbacks callbacks = mCallbacks != null ? mCallbacks.get() : null;
3116                     if (!restoredApps.isEmpty()) {
3117                         mHandler.post(new Runnable() {
3118                             public void run() {
3119                                 Callbacks cb = mCallbacks != null ? mCallbacks.get() : null;
3120                                 if (callbacks == cb && cb != null) {
3121                                     callbacks.bindAppsRestored(restoredApps);
3122                                 }
3123                             }
3124                         });
3125                     }
3126 
3127                 }
3128             }
3129         };
3130         sWorker.post(r);
3131     }
3132 
3133     private class PackageUpdatedTask implements Runnable {
3134         int mOp;
3135         String[] mPackages;
3136         UserHandleCompat mUser;
3137 
3138         public static final int OP_NONE = 0;
3139         public static final int OP_ADD = 1;
3140         public static final int OP_UPDATE = 2;
3141         public static final int OP_REMOVE = 3; // uninstlled
3142         public static final int OP_UNAVAILABLE = 4; // external media unmounted
3143 
3144 
3145         public PackageUpdatedTask(int op, String[] packages, UserHandleCompat user) {
3146             mOp = op;
3147             mPackages = packages;
3148             mUser = user;
3149         }
3150 
3151         public void run() {
3152             final Context context = mApp.getContext();
3153 
3154             final String[] packages = mPackages;
3155             final int N = packages.length;
3156             switch (mOp) {
3157                 case OP_ADD:
3158                     for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {
3159                         if (DEBUG_LOADERS) Log.d(TAG, "mAllAppsList.addPackage " + packages[i]);
3160 <<<<<<< GitAnalyzerPlus_ours
3161                         mIconCache.remove(packages[i], mUser);
3162                         mBgAllAppsList.addPackage(context, packages[i], mUser);
3163 ||||||| GitAnalyzerPlus_base
3164                 Log.d(TAG, "Icons processed in "
3165                         + (SystemClock.uptimeMillis() - loadTime) + "ms");
3166             }
3167         }
3168 
3169         public void dumpState() {
3170             synchronized (sBgLock) {
3171                 Log.d(TAG, "mLoaderTask.mContext=" + mContext);
3172                 Log.d(TAG, "mLoaderTask.mIsLaunching=" + mIsLaunching);
3173                 Log.d(TAG, "mLoaderTask.mStopped=" + mStopped);
3174                 Log.d(TAG, "mLoaderTask.mLoadAndBindStepFinished=" + mLoadAndBindStepFinished);
3175                 Log.d(TAG, "mItems size=" + sBgWorkspaceItems.size());
3176             }
3177         }
3178     }
3179 
3180     void enqueuePackageUpdated(PackageUpdatedTask task) {
3181         sWorker.post(task);
3182     }
3183 
3184     private class PackageUpdatedTask implements Runnable {
3185         int mOp;
3186         String[] mPackages;
3187 
3188         public static final int OP_NONE = 0;
3189         public static final int OP_ADD = 1;
3190         public static final int OP_UPDATE = 2;
3191         public static final int OP_REMOVE = 3; // uninstlled
3192         public static final int OP_UNAVAILABLE = 4; // external media unmounted
3193 
3194 
3195         public PackageUpdatedTask(int op, String[] packages) {
3196             mOp = op;
3197             mPackages = packages;
3198         }
3199 
3200         public void run() {
3201             final Context context = mApp.getContext();
3202 
3203             final String[] packages = mPackages;
3204             final int N = packages.length;
3205             switch (mOp) {
3206                 case OP_ADD:
3207                     for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {
3208                         if (DEBUG_LOADERS) Log.d(TAG, "mAllAppsList.addPackage " + packages[i]);
3209                         mIconCache.remove(packages[i]);
3210                         mBgAllAppsList.addPackage(context, packages[i]);
3211                     }
3212                     break;
3213                 case OP_UPDATE:
3214                     for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {
3215                         if (DEBUG_LOADERS) Log.d(TAG, "mAllAppsList.updatePackage " + packages[i]);
3216                         mBgAllAppsList.updatePackage(context, packages[i]);
3217                         WidgetPreviewLoader.removePackageFromDb(
3218                                 mApp.getWidgetPreviewCacheDb(), packages[i]);
3219                     }
3220                     break;
3221                 case OP_REMOVE:
3222                 case OP_UNAVAILABLE:
3223                     for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {
3224                         if (DEBUG_LOADERS) Log.d(TAG, "mAllAppsList.removePackage " + packages[i]);
3225                         mBgAllAppsList.removePackage(packages[i]);
3226                         WidgetPreviewLoader.removePackageFromDb(
3227                                 mApp.getWidgetPreviewCacheDb(), packages[i]);
3228                     }
3229                     break;
3230             }
3231 
3232             ArrayList<AppInfo> added = null;
3233             ArrayList<AppInfo> modified = null;
3234             final ArrayList<AppInfo> removedApps = new ArrayList<AppInfo>();
3235 
3236             if (mBgAllAppsList.added.size() > 0) {
3237                 added = new ArrayList<AppInfo>(mBgAllAppsList.added);
3238                 mBgAllAppsList.added.clear();
3239             }
3240             if (mBgAllAppsList.modified.size() > 0) {
3241                 modified = new ArrayList<AppInfo>(mBgAllAppsList.modified);
3242                 mBgAllAppsList.modified.clear();
3243             }
3244             if (mBgAllAppsList.removed.size() > 0) {
3245                 removedApps.addAll(mBgAllAppsList.removed);
3246                 mBgAllAppsList.removed.clear();
3247             }
3248 
3249             final Callbacks callbacks = mCallbacks != null ? mCallbacks.get() : null;
3250             if (callbacks == null) {
3251                 Log.w(TAG, "Nobody to tell about the new app.  Launcher is probably loading.");
3252                 return;
3253             }
3254 
3255             if (added != null) {
3256                 // Ensure that we add all the workspace applications to the db
3257                 Callbacks cb = mCallbacks != null ? mCallbacks.get() : null;
3258                 if (!LauncherAppState.isDisableAllApps()) {
3259                     addAndBindAddedApps(context, new ArrayList<ItemInfo>(), cb, added);
3260                 } else {
3261                     final ArrayList<ItemInfo> addedInfos = new ArrayList<ItemInfo>(added);
3262                     addAndBindAddedApps(context, addedInfos, cb, added);
3263                 }
3264             }
3265             if (modified != null) {
3266                 final ArrayList<AppInfo> modifiedFinal = modified;
3267 
3268                 // Update the launcher db to reflect the changes
3269                 for (AppInfo a : modifiedFinal) {
3270                     ArrayList<ItemInfo> infos =
3271                             getItemInfoForComponentName(a.componentName);
3272                     for (ItemInfo i : infos) {
3273                         if (isShortcutInfoUpdateable(i)) {
3274                             ShortcutInfo info = (ShortcutInfo) i;
3275                             info.title = a.title.toString();
3276                             updateItemInDatabase(context, info);
3277                         }
3278                     }
3279                 }
3280 
3281                 mHandler.post(new Runnable() {
3282                     public void run() {
3283                         Callbacks cb = mCallbacks != null ? mCallbacks.get() : null;
3284                         if (callbacks == cb && cb != null) {
3285                             callbacks.bindAppsUpdated(modifiedFinal);
3286                         }
3287                     }
3288                 });
3289             }
3290 
3291             final ArrayList<String> removedPackageNames =
3292                     new ArrayList<String>();
3293             if (mOp == OP_REMOVE) {
3294                 // Mark all packages in the broadcast to be removed
3295                 removedPackageNames.addAll(Arrays.asList(packages));
3296             } else if (mOp == OP_UPDATE) {
3297                 // Mark disabled packages in the broadcast to be removed
3298                 final PackageManager pm = context.getPackageManager();
3299                 for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {
3300                     if (isPackageDisabled(pm, packages[i])) {
3301                         removedPackageNames.add(packages[i]);
3302                     }
3303                 }
3304             }
3305             // Remove all the components associated with this package
3306             for (String pn : removedPackageNames) {
3307                 ArrayList<ItemInfo> infos = getItemInfoForPackageName(pn);
3308                 for (ItemInfo i : infos) {
3309                     deleteItemFromDatabase(context, i);
3310                 }
3311             }
3312             // Remove all the specific components
3313             for (AppInfo a : removedApps) {
3314                 ArrayList<ItemInfo> infos = getItemInfoForComponentName(a.componentName);
3315                 for (ItemInfo i : infos) {
3316                     deleteItemFromDatabase(context, i);
3317                 }
3318             }
3319             if (!removedPackageNames.isEmpty() || !removedApps.isEmpty()) {
3320                 // Remove any queued items from the install queue
3321                 String spKey = LauncherAppState.getSharedPreferencesKey();
3322                 SharedPreferences sp =
3323                         context.getSharedPreferences(spKey, Context.MODE_PRIVATE);
3324                 InstallShortcutReceiver.removeFromInstallQueue(sp, removedPackageNames);
3325                 // Call the components-removed callback
3326                 mHandler.post(new Runnable() {
3327                     public void run() {
3328                         Callbacks cb = mCallbacks != null ? mCallbacks.get() : null;
3329                         if (callbacks == cb && cb != null) {
3330                             callbacks.bindComponentsRemoved(removedPackageNames, removedApps);
3331                         }
3332                     }
3333                 });
3334             }
3335 
3336             final ArrayList<Object> widgetsAndShortcuts =
3337                 getSortedWidgetsAndShortcuts(context);
3338             mHandler.post(new Runnable() {
3339                 @Override
3340                 public void run() {
3341                     Callbacks cb = mCallbacks != null ? mCallbacks.get() : null;
3342                     if (callbacks == cb && cb != null) {
3343                         callbacks.bindPackagesUpdated(widgetsAndShortcuts);
3344                     }
3345                 }
3346             });
3347 
3348             // Write all the logs to disk
3349             mHandler.post(new Runnable() {
3350                 public void run() {
3351                     Callbacks cb = mCallbacks != null ? mCallbacks.get() : null;
3352                     if (callbacks == cb && cb != null) {
3353                         callbacks.dumpLogsToLocalData();
3354                     }
3355                 }
3356             });
3357         }
3358     }
3359 
3360     // Returns a list of ResolveInfos/AppWindowInfos in sorted order
3361     public static ArrayList<Object> getSortedWidgetsAndShortcuts(Context context) {
3362         PackageManager packageManager = context.getPackageManager();
3363         final ArrayList<Object> widgetsAndShortcuts = new ArrayList<Object>();
3364         widgetsAndShortcuts.addAll(AppWidgetManager.getInstance(context).getInstalledProviders());
3365         Intent shortcutsIntent = new Intent(Intent.ACTION_CREATE_SHORTCUT);
3366         widgetsAndShortcuts.addAll(packageManager.queryIntentActivities(shortcutsIntent, 0));
3367         Collections.sort(widgetsAndShortcuts,
3368             new LauncherModel.WidgetAndShortcutNameComparator(packageManager));
3369         return widgetsAndShortcuts;
3370     }
3371 
3372     private static boolean isPackageDisabled(PackageManager pm, String packageName) {
3373         try {
3374             PackageInfo pi = pm.getPackageInfo(packageName, 0);
3375             return !pi.applicationInfo.enabled;
3376         } catch (NameNotFoundException e) {
3377             // Fall through
3378         }
3379         return false;
3380     }
3381 
3382     public static boolean isValidPackageComponent(PackageManager pm, ComponentName cn) {
3383         if (cn == null) {
3384             return false;
3385         }
3386         if (isPackageDisabled(pm, cn.getPackageName())) {
3387             return false;
3388         }
3389 
3390         try {
3391             // Check the activity
3392             PackageInfo pi = pm.getPackageInfo(cn.getPackageName(), 0);
3393             return (pm.getActivityInfo(cn, 0) != null);
3394         } catch (NameNotFoundException e) {
3395             return false;
3396         }
3397     }
3398 
3399     /**
3400      * Make an ShortcutInfo object for a restored application or shortcut item that points
3401      * to a package that is not yet installed on the system.
3402      */
3403     public ShortcutInfo getRestoredItemInfo(Cursor cursor, int titleIndex) {
3404         final ShortcutInfo info = new ShortcutInfo();
3405         if (cursor != null) {
3406             info.title =  cursor.getString(titleIndex);
3407         } else {
3408             info.title = "";
3409         }
3410         info.setIcon(mIconCache.getIcon(intent, info.title.toString()));
3411         info.itemType = LauncherSettings.Favorites.ITEM_TYPE_SHORTCUT;
3412         return info;
3413     }
3414 
3415     /**
3416      * Make an Intent object for a restored application or shortcut item that points
3417      * to the market page for the item.
3418      */
3419     private Intent getRestoredItemIntent(Cursor c, Context context, Intent intent) {
3420         ComponentName componentName = intent.getComponent();
3421         Intent marketIntent = new Intent(Intent.ACTION_VIEW);
3422         Uri marketUri = new Uri.Builder()
3423                 .scheme("market")
3424                 .authority("details")
3425                 .appendQueryParameter("id", componentName.getPackageName())
3426                 .build();
3427         Log.d(TAG, "manufactured intent uri: " + marketUri.toString());
3428         marketIntent.setData(marketUri);
3429         return marketIntent;
3430     }
3431 
3432     /**
3433      * This is called from the code that adds shortcuts from the intent receiver.  This
3434      * doesn't have a Cursor, but
3435      */
3436     public ShortcutInfo getShortcutInfo(PackageManager manager, Intent intent, Context context) {
3437         return getShortcutInfo(manager, intent, context, null, -1, -1, null);
3438     }
3439 
3440     /**
3441      * Make an ShortcutInfo object for a shortcut that is an application.
3442      *
3443      * If c is not null, then it will be used to fill in missing data like the title and icon.
3444      */
3445     public ShortcutInfo getShortcutInfo(PackageManager manager, Intent intent, Context context,
3446             Cursor c, int iconIndex, int titleIndex, HashMap<Object, CharSequence> labelCache) {
3447         ComponentName componentName = intent.getComponent();
3448         final ShortcutInfo info = new ShortcutInfo();
3449         if (componentName != null && !isValidPackageComponent(manager, componentName)) {
3450             Log.d(TAG, "Invalid package found in getShortcutInfo: " + componentName);
3451             return null;
3452         } else {
3453             try {
3454                 PackageInfo pi = manager.getPackageInfo(componentName.getPackageName(), 0);
3455                 info.initFlagsAndFirstInstallTime(pi);
3456             } catch (NameNotFoundException e) {
3457                 Log.d(TAG, "getPackInfo failed for package " +
3458                         componentName.getPackageName());
3459             }
3460         }
3461 
3462         // TODO: See if the PackageManager knows about this case.  If it doesn't
3463         // then return null & delete this.
3464 
3465         // the resource -- This may implicitly give us back the fallback icon,
3466         // but don't worry about that.  All we're doing with usingFallbackIcon is
3467         // to avoid saving lots of copies of that in the database, and most apps
3468         // have icons anyway.
3469 
3470         // Attempt to use queryIntentActivities to get the ResolveInfo (with IntentFilter info) and
3471         // if that fails, or is ambiguious, fallback to the standard way of getting the resolve info
3472         // via resolveActivity().
3473         Bitmap icon = null;
3474         ResolveInfo resolveInfo = null;
3475         ComponentName oldComponent = intent.getComponent();
3476         Intent newIntent = new Intent(intent.getAction(), null);
3477         newIntent.addCategory(Intent.CATEGORY_LAUNCHER);
3478         newIntent.setPackage(oldComponent.getPackageName());
3479         List<ResolveInfo> infos = manager.queryIntentActivities(newIntent, 0);
3480         for (ResolveInfo i : infos) {
3481             ComponentName cn = new ComponentName(i.activityInfo.packageName,
3482                     i.activityInfo.name);
3483             if (cn.equals(oldComponent)) {
3484                 resolveInfo = i;
3485             }
3486         }
3487         if (resolveInfo == null) {
3488             resolveInfo = manager.resolveActivity(intent, 0);
3489         }
3490         if (resolveInfo != null) {
3491             icon = mIconCache.getIcon(componentName, resolveInfo, labelCache);
3492         }
3493         // the db
3494         if (icon == null) {
3495             if (c != null) {
3496                 icon = getIconFromCursor(c, iconIndex, context);
3497             }
3498         }
3499         // the fallback icon
3500         if (icon == null) {
3501             icon = getFallbackIcon();
3502             info.usingFallbackIcon = true;
3503         }
3504         info.setIcon(icon);
3505 
3506         // from the resource
3507         if (resolveInfo != null) {
3508             ComponentName key = LauncherModel.getComponentNameFromResolveInfo(resolveInfo);
3509             if (labelCache != null && labelCache.containsKey(key)) {
3510                 info.title = labelCache.get(key);
3511             } else {
3512                 info.title = resolveInfo.activityInfo.loadLabel(manager);
3513                 if (labelCache != null) {
3514                     labelCache.put(key, info.title);
3515                 }
3516             }
3517         }
3518         // from the db
3519         if (info.title == null) {
3520             if (c != null) {
3521                 info.title =  c.getString(titleIndex);
3522             }
3523         }
3524         // fall back to the class name of the activity
3525         if (info.title == null) {
3526             info.title = componentName.getClassName();
3527         }
3528         info.itemType = LauncherSettings.Favorites.ITEM_TYPE_APPLICATION;
3529         return info;
3530     }
3531 
3532     static ArrayList<ItemInfo> filterItemInfos(Collection<ItemInfo> infos,
3533             ItemInfoFilter f) {
3534         HashSet<ItemInfo> filtered = new HashSet<ItemInfo>();
3535         for (ItemInfo i : infos) {
3536             if (i instanceof ShortcutInfo) {
3537                 ShortcutInfo info = (ShortcutInfo) i;
3538                 ComponentName cn = info.intent.getComponent();
3539                 if (cn != null && f.filterItem(null, info, cn)) {
3540                     filtered.add(info);
3541                 }
3542             } else if (i instanceof FolderInfo) {
3543                 FolderInfo info = (FolderInfo) i;
3544                 for (ShortcutInfo s : info.contents) {
3545                     ComponentName cn = s.intent.getComponent();
3546                     if (cn != null && f.filterItem(info, s, cn)) {
3547                         filtered.add(s);
3548                     }
3549                 }
3550             } else if (i instanceof LauncherAppWidgetInfo) {
3551                 LauncherAppWidgetInfo info = (LauncherAppWidgetInfo) i;
3552                 ComponentName cn = info.providerName;
3553                 if (cn != null && f.filterItem(null, info, cn)) {
3554                     filtered.add(info);
3555                 }
3556             }
3557         }
3558         return new ArrayList<ItemInfo>(filtered);
3559     }
3560 
3561     private ArrayList<ItemInfo> getItemInfoForPackageName(final String pn) {
3562         ItemInfoFilter filter  = new ItemInfoFilter() {
3563             @Override
3564             public boolean filterItem(ItemInfo parent, ItemInfo info, ComponentName cn) {
3565                 return cn.getPackageName().equals(pn);
3566             }
3567         };
3568         return filterItemInfos(sBgItemsIdMap.values(), filter);
3569     }
3570 
3571     private ArrayList<ItemInfo> getItemInfoForComponentName(final ComponentName cname) {
3572         ItemInfoFilter filter  = new ItemInfoFilter() {
3573             @Override
3574             public boolean filterItem(ItemInfo parent, ItemInfo info, ComponentName cn) {
3575                 return cn.equals(cname);
3576             }
3577         };
3578         return filterItemInfos(sBgItemsIdMap.values(), filter);
3579     }
3580 
3581     public static boolean isShortcutInfoUpdateable(ItemInfo i) {
3582         if (i instanceof ShortcutInfo) {
3583             ShortcutInfo info = (ShortcutInfo) i;
3584             // We need to check for ACTION_MAIN otherwise getComponent() might
3585             // return null for some shortcuts (for instance, for shortcuts to
3586             // web pages.)
3587             Intent intent = info.intent;
3588             ComponentName name = intent.getComponent();
3589             if (info.itemType == LauncherSettings.Favorites.ITEM_TYPE_APPLICATION &&
3590                     Intent.ACTION_MAIN.equals(intent.getAction()) && name != null) {
3591                 return true;
3592             }
3593         }
3594         return false;
3595     }
3596 
3597     /**
3598      * Make an ShortcutInfo object for a shortcut that isn't an application.
3599      */
3600     private ShortcutInfo getShortcutInfo(Cursor c, Context context,
3601 =======
3602                         mBgAllAppsList.addPackage(context, packages[i]);
3603 >>>>>>> GitAnalyzerPlus_theirs
3604                     }
3605                     break;
3606                 case OP_UPDATE:
3607                     for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {
3608                         if (DEBUG_LOADERS) Log.d(TAG, "mAllAppsList.updatePackage " + packages[i]);
3609                         mBgAllAppsList.updatePackage(context, packages[i], mUser);
3610                         WidgetPreviewLoader.removePackageFromDb(
3611                                 mApp.getWidgetPreviewCacheDb(), packages[i]);
3612                     }
3613                     break;
3614                 case OP_REMOVE:
3615                 case OP_UNAVAILABLE:
3616                     for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {
3617                         if (DEBUG_LOADERS) Log.d(TAG, "mAllAppsList.removePackage " + packages[i]);
3618                         mBgAllAppsList.removePackage(packages[i], mUser);
3619                         WidgetPreviewLoader.removePackageFromDb(
3620                                 mApp.getWidgetPreviewCacheDb(), packages[i]);
3621                     }
3622                     break;
3623             }
3624 
3625             ArrayList<AppInfo> added = null;
3626             ArrayList<AppInfo> modified = null;
3627             final ArrayList<AppInfo> removedApps = new ArrayList<AppInfo>();
3628 
3629             if (mBgAllAppsList.added.size() > 0) {
3630                 added = new ArrayList<AppInfo>(mBgAllAppsList.added);
3631                 mBgAllAppsList.added.clear();
3632             }
3633             if (mBgAllAppsList.modified.size() > 0) {
3634                 modified = new ArrayList<AppInfo>(mBgAllAppsList.modified);
3635                 mBgAllAppsList.modified.clear();
3636             }
3637             if (mBgAllAppsList.removed.size() > 0) {
3638                 removedApps.addAll(mBgAllAppsList.removed);
3639                 mBgAllAppsList.removed.clear();
3640             }
3641 
3642             final Callbacks callbacks = mCallbacks != null ? mCallbacks.get() : null;
3643             if (callbacks == null) {
3644                 Log.w(TAG, "Nobody to tell about the new app.  Launcher is probably loading.");
3645                 return;
3646             }
3647 
3648             if (added != null) {
3649                 // Ensure that we add all the workspace applications to the db
3650                 if (LauncherAppState.isDisableAllApps()) {
3651                     final ArrayList<ItemInfo> addedInfos = new ArrayList<ItemInfo>(added);
3652                     addAndBindAddedWorkspaceApps(context, addedInfos);
3653                 } else {
3654                     addAppsToAllApps(context, added);
3655                 }
3656             }
3657 
3658             if (modified != null) {
3659                 final ArrayList<AppInfo> modifiedFinal = modified;
3660 
3661                 // Update the launcher db to reflect the changes
3662                 for (AppInfo a : modifiedFinal) {
3663                     ArrayList<ItemInfo> infos =
3664                             getItemInfoForComponentName(a.componentName, mUser);
3665                     for (ItemInfo i : infos) {
3666                         if (isShortcutInfoUpdateable(i)) {
3667                             ShortcutInfo info = (ShortcutInfo) i;
3668                             info.title = a.title.toString();
3669                             info.contentDescription = a.contentDescription;
3670                             updateItemInDatabase(context, info);
3671                         }
3672                     }
3673                 }
3674 
3675                 mHandler.post(new Runnable() {
3676                     public void run() {
3677                         Callbacks cb = mCallbacks != null ? mCallbacks.get() : null;
3678                         if (callbacks == cb && cb != null) {
3679                             callbacks.bindAppsUpdated(modifiedFinal);
3680                         }
3681                     }
3682                 });
3683             }
3684 
3685             final ArrayList<String> removedPackageNames =
3686                     new ArrayList<String>();
3687             if (mOp == OP_REMOVE) {
3688                 // Mark all packages in the broadcast to be removed
3689                 removedPackageNames.addAll(Arrays.asList(packages));
3690             } else if (mOp == OP_UPDATE) {
3691                 // Mark disabled packages in the broadcast to be removed
3692                 final PackageManager pm = context.getPackageManager();
3693                 for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {
3694                     if (isPackageDisabled(context, packages[i], mUser)) {
3695                         removedPackageNames.add(packages[i]);
3696                     }
3697                 }
3698             }
3699             // Remove all the components associated with this package
3700             for (String pn : removedPackageNames) {
3701                 deletePackageFromDatabase(context, pn, mUser);
3702             }
3703             // Remove all the specific components
3704             for (AppInfo a : removedApps) {
3705                 ArrayList<ItemInfo> infos = getItemInfoForComponentName(a.componentName, mUser);
3706                 deleteItemsFromDatabase(context, infos);
3707             }
3708             if (!removedPackageNames.isEmpty() || !removedApps.isEmpty()) {
3709                 // Remove any queued items from the install queue
3710                 String spKey = LauncherAppState.getSharedPreferencesKey();
3711                 SharedPreferences sp =
3712                         context.getSharedPreferences(spKey, Context.MODE_PRIVATE);
3713                 InstallShortcutReceiver.removeFromInstallQueue(sp, removedPackageNames);
3714                 // Call the components-removed callback
3715                 mHandler.post(new Runnable() {
3716                     public void run() {
3717                         Callbacks cb = mCallbacks != null ? mCallbacks.get() : null;
3718                         if (callbacks == cb && cb != null) {
3719                             callbacks.bindComponentsRemoved(removedPackageNames, removedApps, mUser);
3720                         }
3721                     }
3722                 });
3723             }
3724 
3725             final ArrayList<Object> widgetsAndShortcuts =
3726                     getSortedWidgetsAndShortcuts(context);
3727             mHandler.post(new Runnable() {
3728                 @Override
3729                 public void run() {
3730                     Callbacks cb = mCallbacks != null ? mCallbacks.get() : null;
3731                     if (callbacks == cb && cb != null) {
3732                         callbacks.bindPackagesUpdated(widgetsAndShortcuts);
3733                     }
3734                 }
3735             });
3736 
3737             // Write all the logs to disk
3738             mHandler.post(new Runnable() {
3739                 public void run() {
3740                     Callbacks cb = mCallbacks != null ? mCallbacks.get() : null;
3741                     if (callbacks == cb && cb != null) {
3742                         callbacks.dumpLogsToLocalData();
3743                     }
3744                 }
3745             });
3746         }
3747     }
3748 
3749     // Returns a list of ResolveInfos/AppWindowInfos in sorted order
3750     public static ArrayList<Object> getSortedWidgetsAndShortcuts(Context context) {
3751         PackageManager packageManager = context.getPackageManager();
3752         final ArrayList<Object> widgetsAndShortcuts = new ArrayList<Object>();
3753         widgetsAndShortcuts.addAll(AppWidgetManagerCompat.getInstance(context).getAllProviders());
3754 
3755         Intent shortcutsIntent = new Intent(Intent.ACTION_CREATE_SHORTCUT);
3756         widgetsAndShortcuts.addAll(packageManager.queryIntentActivities(shortcutsIntent, 0));
3757         Collections.sort(widgetsAndShortcuts, new WidgetAndShortcutNameComparator(context));
3758         return widgetsAndShortcuts;
3759     }
3760 
3761     private static boolean isPackageDisabled(Context context, String packageName,
3762             UserHandleCompat user) {
3763         final LauncherAppsCompat launcherApps = LauncherAppsCompat.getInstance(context);
3764         return !launcherApps.isPackageEnabledForProfile(packageName, user);
3765     }
3766 
3767     public static boolean isValidPackageActivity(Context context, ComponentName cn,
3768             UserHandleCompat user) {
3769         if (cn == null) {
3770             return false;
3771         }
3772         final LauncherAppsCompat launcherApps = LauncherAppsCompat.getInstance(context);
3773         if (!launcherApps.isPackageEnabledForProfile(cn.getPackageName(), user)) {
3774             return false;
3775         }
3776         return launcherApps.isActivityEnabledForProfile(cn, user);
3777     }
3778 
3779     public static boolean isValidPackage(Context context, String packageName,
3780             UserHandleCompat user) {
3781         if (packageName == null) {
3782             return false;
3783         }
3784         final LauncherAppsCompat launcherApps = LauncherAppsCompat.getInstance(context);
3785         return launcherApps.isPackageEnabledForProfile(packageName, user);
3786     }

3793             int promiseType) {
3794         final ShortcutInfo info = new ShortcutInfo();

3803             }

3812     // Returns a list of ResolveInfos/AppWindowInfos in sorted order
3813     public static ArrayList<Object> getSortedWidgetsAndShortcuts(Context context) {
3814         PackageManager packageManager = context.getPackageManager();
3815         final ArrayList<Object> widgetsAndShortcuts = new ArrayList<Object>();
3816         widgetsAndShortcuts.addAll(AppWidgetManager.getInstance(context).getInstalledProviders());
3817         Intent shortcutsIntent = new Intent(Intent.ACTION_CREATE_SHORTCUT);
3818         widgetsAndShortcuts.addAll(packageManager.queryIntentActivities(shortcutsIntent, 0));
3819         Collections.sort(widgetsAndShortcuts,
3820             new LauncherModel.WidgetAndShortcutNameComparator(packageManager));
3821         return widgetsAndShortcuts;
3822     }
3823 
3824     private static boolean isPackageDisabled(PackageManager pm, String packageName) {
3825         try {
3826             PackageInfo pi = pm.getPackageInfo(packageName, 0);
3827             return !pi.applicationInfo.enabled;
3828         } catch (NameNotFoundException e) {
3829             // Fall through
3830         }
3831         return false;
3832     }
3833 
3834     public static boolean isValidPackageComponent(PackageManager pm, ComponentName cn) {
3835         if (cn == null) {
3836             return false;
3837         }
3838         if (isPackageDisabled(pm, cn.getPackageName())) {
3839             return false;
3840         }
3841 
3842         try {
3843             // Check the activity
3844             PackageInfo pi = pm.getPackageInfo(cn.getPackageName(), 0);
3845             return (pm.getActivityInfo(cn, 0) != null);
3846         } catch (NameNotFoundException e) {
3847             return false;
3848         }
3849     }
3850 
3851     /**
3852      * Make an ShortcutInfo object for a restored application or shortcut item that points
3853      * to a package that is not yet installed on the system.
3854      */
3855     public ShortcutInfo getRestoredItemInfo(Cursor cursor, int titleIndex) {
3856         final ShortcutInfo info = new ShortcutInfo();
3857         if (cursor != null) {
3858             info.title =  cursor.getString(titleIndex);
3859         } else {
3860             info.title = "";
3861         }
3862         info.setIcon(mIconCache.getIcon(intent, info.title.toString()));
3863         info.itemType = LauncherSettings.Favorites.ITEM_TYPE_SHORTCUT;
3864         return info;
3865     }
3866 
3867     /**
3868      * Make an Intent object for a restored application or shortcut item that points
3869      * to the market page for the item.
3870      */
3871     private Intent getRestoredItemIntent(Cursor c, Context context, Intent intent) {
3872         ComponentName componentName = intent.getComponent();
3873         Intent marketIntent = new Intent(Intent.ACTION_VIEW);
3874         Uri marketUri = new Uri.Builder()
3875                 .scheme("market")
3876                 .authority("details")
3877                 .appendQueryParameter("id", componentName.getPackageName())
3878                 .build();
3879         Log.d(TAG, "manufactured intent uri: " + marketUri.toString());
3880         marketIntent.setData(marketUri);
3881         return marketIntent;
3882     }
3883 
3884     /**
3885      * This is called from the code that adds shortcuts from the intent receiver.  This
3886      * doesn't have a Cursor, but
3887      */
3888     public ShortcutInfo getShortcutInfo(PackageManager manager, Intent intent, Context context) {
3889         return getShortcutInfo(manager, intent, context, null, -1, -1, null);
3890     }
3891 
3892     /**
3893      * Make an ShortcutInfo object for a shortcut that is an application.
3894      *
3895      * If c is not null, then it will be used to fill in missing data like the title and icon.
3896      */
3897     public ShortcutInfo getShortcutInfo(PackageManager manager, Intent intent, Context context,
3898             Cursor c, int iconIndex, int titleIndex, HashMap<Object, CharSequence> labelCache) {
3899         ComponentName componentName = intent.getComponent();
3900         final ShortcutInfo info = new ShortcutInfo();
3901         if (componentName != null && !isValidPackageComponent(manager, componentName)) {
3902             Log.d(TAG, "Invalid package found in getShortcutInfo: " + componentName);
3903             return null;
3904         } else {
3905             try {
3906                 PackageInfo pi = manager.getPackageInfo(componentName.getPackageName(), 0);
3907                 info.initFlagsAndFirstInstallTime(pi);
3908             } catch (NameNotFoundException e) {
3909                 Log.d(TAG, "getPackInfo failed for package " +
3910                         componentName.getPackageName());
3911             }
3912         }
3913 
3914         // TODO: See if the PackageManager knows about this case.  If it doesn't
3915         // then return null & delete this.
3916 
3917         // the resource -- This may implicitly give us back the fallback icon,
3918         // but don't worry about that.  All we're doing with usingFallbackIcon is
3919         // to avoid saving lots of copies of that in the database, and most apps
3920         // have icons anyway.
3921 
3922         // Attempt to use queryIntentActivities to get the ResolveInfo (with IntentFilter info) and
3923         // if that fails, or is ambiguious, fallback to the standard way of getting the resolve info
3924         // via resolveActivity().
3925         Bitmap icon = null;
3926         ResolveInfo resolveInfo = null;
3927         ComponentName oldComponent = intent.getComponent();
3928         Intent newIntent = new Intent(intent.getAction(), null);
3929         newIntent.addCategory(Intent.CATEGORY_LAUNCHER);
3930         newIntent.setPackage(oldComponent.getPackageName());
3931         List<ResolveInfo> infos = manager.queryIntentActivities(newIntent, 0);
3932         for (ResolveInfo i : infos) {
3933             ComponentName cn = new ComponentName(i.activityInfo.packageName,
3934                     i.activityInfo.name);
3935             if (cn.equals(oldComponent)) {
3936                 resolveInfo = i;
3937             }
3938         }
3939         if (resolveInfo == null) {
3940             resolveInfo = manager.resolveActivity(intent, 0);
3941         }
3942         if (resolveInfo != null) {
3943             icon = mIconCache.getIcon(componentName, resolveInfo, labelCache);
3944         }
3945         // the db
3946         if (icon == null) {
3947             if (c != null) {
3948                 icon = getIconFromCursor(c, iconIndex, context);
3949             }
3950         }
3951         // the fallback icon
3952         if (icon == null) {
3953             icon = getFallbackIcon();
3954             info.usingFallbackIcon = true;
3955         }
3956         info.setIcon(icon);
3957 
3958         // from the resource
3959         if (resolveInfo != null) {
3960             ComponentName key = LauncherModel.getComponentNameFromResolveInfo(resolveInfo);
3961             if (labelCache != null && labelCache.containsKey(key)) {
3962                 info.title = labelCache.get(key);
3963             } else {
3964                 info.title = resolveInfo.activityInfo.loadLabel(manager);
3965                 if (labelCache != null) {
3966                     labelCache.put(key, info.title);
3967                 }
3968             }
3969         }
3970         // from the db
3971         if (info.title == null) {
3972             if (c != null) {
3973                 info.title =  c.getString(titleIndex);
3974             }
3975         }
3976         // fall back to the class name of the activity
3977         if (info.title == null) {
3978             info.title = componentName.getClassName();
3979         }
3980         info.itemType = LauncherSettings.Favorites.ITEM_TYPE_APPLICATION;
3981         return info;
3982     }
3983 
3984     static ArrayList<ItemInfo> filterItemInfos(Collection<ItemInfo> infos,
3985             ItemInfoFilter f) {
3986         HashSet<ItemInfo> filtered = new HashSet<ItemInfo>();
3987         for (ItemInfo i : infos) {
3988             if (i instanceof ShortcutInfo) {
3989                 ShortcutInfo info = (ShortcutInfo) i;
3990                 ComponentName cn = info.intent.getComponent();
3991                 if (cn != null && f.filterItem(null, info, cn)) {
3992                     filtered.add(info);
3993                 }
3994             } else if (i instanceof FolderInfo) {
3995                 FolderInfo info = (FolderInfo) i;
3996                 for (ShortcutInfo s : info.contents) {
3997                     ComponentName cn = s.intent.getComponent();
3998                     if (cn != null && f.filterItem(info, s, cn)) {
3999                         filtered.add(s);
4000                     }
4001                 }
4002             } else if (i instanceof LauncherAppWidgetInfo) {
4003                 LauncherAppWidgetInfo info = (LauncherAppWidgetInfo) i;
4004                 ComponentName cn = info.providerName;
4005                 if (cn != null && f.filterItem(null, info, cn)) {
4006                     filtered.add(info);
4007                 }
4008             }
4009         }
4010         return new ArrayList<ItemInfo>(filtered);
4011     }
4012 
4013     private ArrayList<ItemInfo> getItemInfoForPackageName(final String pn) {
4014         ItemInfoFilter filter  = new ItemInfoFilter() {
4015             @Override
4016             public boolean filterItem(ItemInfo parent, ItemInfo info, ComponentName cn) {
4017                 return cn.getPackageName().equals(pn);
4018             }
4019         };
4020         return filterItemInfos(sBgItemsIdMap.values(), filter);
4021     }
4022 
4023     private ArrayList<ItemInfo> getItemInfoForComponentName(final ComponentName cname) {
4024         ItemInfoFilter filter  = new ItemInfoFilter() {
4025             @Override
4026             public boolean filterItem(ItemInfo parent, ItemInfo info, ComponentName cn) {
4027                 return cn.equals(cname);
4028             }
4029         };
4030         return filterItemInfos(sBgItemsIdMap.values(), filter);
4031     }
4032 
4033     public static boolean isShortcutInfoUpdateable(ItemInfo i) {
4034         if (i instanceof ShortcutInfo) {
4035             ShortcutInfo info = (ShortcutInfo) i;
4036             // We need to check for ACTION_MAIN otherwise getComponent() might
4037             // return null for some shortcuts (for instance, for shortcuts to
4038             // web pages.)
4039             Intent intent = info.intent;
4040             ComponentName name = intent.getComponent();
4041             if (info.itemType == LauncherSettings.Favorites.ITEM_TYPE_APPLICATION &&
4042                     Intent.ACTION_MAIN.equals(intent.getAction()) && name != null) {
4043                 return true;
4044             }
4045         }
4046         return false;
4047     }
4048 
4049     /**
4050      * Make an ShortcutInfo object for a shortcut that isn't an application.
4051      */
4052     private ShortcutInfo getShortcutInfo(Cursor c, Context context,
4053             int iconTypeIndex, int iconPackageIndex, int iconResourceIndex, int iconIndex,
4054             int titleIndex) {
4055 
4056         Bitmap icon = null;
4057         final ShortcutInfo info = new ShortcutInfo();
4058         info.itemType = LauncherSettings.Favorites.ITEM_TYPE_SHORTCUT;
4059 
4060         // TODO: If there's an explicit component and we can't install that, delete it.
4061 
4062         info.title = c.getString(titleIndex);
4063 
4064         int iconType = c.getInt(iconTypeIndex);
4065         switch (iconType) {
4066         case LauncherSettings.Favorites.ICON_TYPE_RESOURCE:
4067             String packageName = c.getString(iconPackageIndex);
4068             String resourceName = c.getString(iconResourceIndex);
4069             PackageManager packageManager = context.getPackageManager();
4070             info.customIcon = false;
4071             // the resource
4072             try {
4073                 Resources resources = packageManager.getResourcesForApplication(packageName);
4074                 if (resources != null) {
4075                     final int id = resources.getIdentifier(resourceName, null, null);
4076                     icon = Utilities.createIconBitmap(
4077                             mIconCache.getFullResIcon(resources, id), context);
4078                 }
4079             } catch (Exception e) {
4080                 // drop this.  we have other places to look for icons
4081             }
4082             // the db
4083             if (icon == null) {
4084                 icon = getIconFromCursor(c, iconIndex, context);
4085             }
4086             // the fallback icon
4087             if (icon == null) {
4088                 icon = getFallbackIcon();
4089                 info.usingFallbackIcon = true;
4090             }
4091             break;
4092         case LauncherSettings.Favorites.ICON_TYPE_BITMAP:
4093             icon = getIconFromCursor(c, iconIndex, context);
4094             if (icon == null) {
4095                 icon = getFallbackIcon();
4096                 info.customIcon = false;
4097                 info.usingFallbackIcon = true;
4098             } else {
4099                 info.customIcon = true;
4100             }
4101             break;
4102         default:
4103             icon = getFallbackIcon();
4104             info.usingFallbackIcon = true;
4105             info.customIcon = false;
4106             break;
4107         }
4108         info.setIcon(icon);
4109         return info;
4110     }
4111 
4112     Bitmap getIconFromCursor(Cursor c, int iconIndex, Context context) {
4113         @SuppressWarnings("all") // suppress dead code warning
4114         final boolean debug = false;
4115         if (debug) {
4116             Log.d(TAG, "getIconFromCursor app="
4117                     + c.getString(c.getColumnIndexOrThrow(LauncherSettings.Favorites.TITLE)));
4118         }
4119         byte[] data = c.getBlob(iconIndex);
4120         try {
4121             return Utilities.createIconBitmap(
4122                     BitmapFactory.decodeByteArray(data, 0, data.length), context);
4123         } catch (Exception e) {
4124             return null;
4125         }
4126     }
4127 
4128     ShortcutInfo addShortcut(Context context, Intent data, long container, int screen,
4129             int cellX, int cellY, boolean notify) {
4130         final ShortcutInfo info = infoFromShortcutIntent(context, data, null);
4131         if (info == null) {
4132             return null;
4133         }
4134         addItemToDatabase(context, info, container, screen, cellX, cellY, notify);
4135 
4136         return info;
4137     }
4138 
4139     /**
4140      * Attempts to find an AppWidgetProviderInfo that matches the given component.
4141      */
4142     AppWidgetProviderInfo findAppWidgetProviderInfoWithComponent(Context context,
4143             ComponentName component) {
4144         List<AppWidgetProviderInfo> widgets =
4145             AppWidgetManager.getInstance(context).getInstalledProviders();
4146         for (AppWidgetProviderInfo info : widgets) {
4147             if (info.provider.equals(component)) {
4148                 return info;
4149             }
4150         }
4151         return null;
4152     }
4153 
4154     /**
4155      * Returns a list of all the widgets that can handle configuration with a particular mimeType.
4156      */
4157     List<WidgetMimeTypeHandlerData> resolveWidgetsForMimeType(Context context, String mimeType) {
4158         final PackageManager packageManager = context.getPackageManager();
4159         final List<WidgetMimeTypeHandlerData> supportedConfigurationActivities =
4160             new ArrayList<WidgetMimeTypeHandlerData>();
4161 
4162         final Intent supportsIntent =
4163             new Intent(InstallWidgetReceiver.ACTION_SUPPORTS_CLIPDATA_MIMETYPE);
4164         supportsIntent.setType(mimeType);
4165 
4166         // Create a set of widget configuration components that we can test against
4167         final List<AppWidgetProviderInfo> widgets =
4168             AppWidgetManager.getInstance(context).getInstalledProviders();
4169         final HashMap<ComponentName, AppWidgetProviderInfo> configurationComponentToWidget =
4170             new HashMap<ComponentName, AppWidgetProviderInfo>();
4171         for (AppWidgetProviderInfo info : widgets) {
4172             configurationComponentToWidget.put(info.configure, info);
4173         }
4174 
4175         // Run through each of the intents that can handle this type of clip data, and cross
4176         // reference them with the components that are actual configuration components
4177         final List<ResolveInfo> activities = packageManager.queryIntentActivities(supportsIntent,
4178                 PackageManager.MATCH_DEFAULT_ONLY);
4179         for (ResolveInfo info : activities) {
4180             final ActivityInfo activityInfo = info.activityInfo;
4181             final ComponentName infoComponent = new ComponentName(activityInfo.packageName,
4182                     activityInfo.name);
4183             if (configurationComponentToWidget.containsKey(infoComponent)) {
4184                 supportedConfigurationActivities.add(
4185                         new InstallWidgetReceiver.WidgetMimeTypeHandlerData(info,
4186                                 configurationComponentToWidget.get(infoComponent)));
4187             }
4188         }
4189         return supportedConfigurationActivities;
4190     }
4191 
4192     ShortcutInfo infoFromShortcutIntent(Context context, Intent data, Bitmap fallbackIcon) {
4193         Intent intent = data.getParcelableExtra(Intent.EXTRA_SHORTCUT_INTENT);
4194         String name = data.getStringExtra(Intent.EXTRA_SHORTCUT_NAME);
4195         Parcelable bitmap = data.getParcelableExtra(Intent.EXTRA_SHORTCUT_ICON);
4196 
4197         if (intent == null) {
4198             // If the intent is null, we can't construct a valid ShortcutInfo, so we return null
4199             Log.e(TAG, "Can't construct ShorcutInfo with null intent");
4200             return null;
4201         }
4202 
4203         Bitmap icon = null;
4204         boolean customIcon = false;
4205         ShortcutIconResource iconResource = null;
4206 
4207         if (bitmap != null && bitmap instanceof Bitmap) {
4208             icon = Utilities.createIconBitmap(new FastBitmapDrawable((Bitmap)bitmap), context);
4209             customIcon = true;
4210         } else {
4211             Parcelable extra = data.getParcelableExtra(Intent.EXTRA_SHORTCUT_ICON_RESOURCE);
4212             if (extra != null && extra instanceof ShortcutIconResource) {
4213                 try {
4214                     iconResource = (ShortcutIconResource) extra;
4215                     final PackageManager packageManager = context.getPackageManager();
4216                     Resources resources = packageManager.getResourcesForApplication(
4217                             iconResource.packageName);
4218                     final int id = resources.getIdentifier(iconResource.resourceName, null, null);
4219                     icon = Utilities.createIconBitmap(
4220                             mIconCache.getFullResIcon(resources, id), context);
4221                 } catch (Exception e) {
4222                     Log.w(TAG, "Could not load shortcut icon: " + extra);
4223                 }
4224             }
4225         }
4226 
4227         final ShortcutInfo info = new ShortcutInfo();
4228 
4229         if (icon == null) {
4230             if (fallbackIcon != null) {
4231                 icon = fallbackIcon;
4232             } else {
4233                 icon = getFallbackIcon();
4234                 info.usingFallbackIcon = true;
4235             }
4236         }
4237         info.setIcon(icon);
4238 
4239         info.title = name;
4240         info.intent = intent;
4241         info.customIcon = customIcon;
4242         info.iconResource = iconResource;
4243 
4244         return info;
4245     }
4246 
4247     boolean queueIconToBeChecked(HashMap<Object, byte[]> cache, ShortcutInfo info, Cursor c,
4248             int iconIndex) {
4249         // If apps can't be on SD, don't even bother.
4250         if (!mAppsCanBeOnRemoveableStorage) {
4251             return false;
4252         }
4253         // If this icon doesn't have a custom icon, check to see
4254         // what's stored in the DB, and if it doesn't match what
4255         // we're going to show, store what we are going to show back
4256         // into the DB.  We do this so when we're loading, if the
4257         // package manager can't find an icon (for example because
4258 =======
4259         info.usingFallbackIcon = true;
4260         info.setIcon(getFallbackIcon());
4261         if (cursor != null) {
4262             info.title =  cursor.getString(titleIndex);
4263 >>>>>>> GitAnalyzerPlus_theirs
4264         } else {
4265             throw new InvalidParameterException("Invalid restoreType " + promiseType);
4266         }
4267 <<<<<<< GitAnalyzerPlus_ours
4268 
4269         info.contentDescription = mUserManager.getBadgedLabelForUser(
4270                 info.title.toString(), info.user);
4271 ||||||| GitAnalyzerPlus_base
4272         widgetsAndShortcuts.addAll(packageManager.queryIntentActivities(shortcutsIntent, 0));
4273         Collections.sort(widgetsAndShortcuts,
4274             new LauncherModel.WidgetAndShortcutNameComparator(packageManager));
4275         return widgetsAndShortcuts;
4276     }
4277 
4278     private static boolean isPackageDisabled(PackageManager pm, String packageName) {
4279         try {
4280             PackageInfo pi = pm.getPackageInfo(packageName, 0);
4281             return !pi.applicationInfo.enabled;
4282         } catch (NameNotFoundException e) {
4283             // Fall through
4284         }
4285         return false;
4286     }
4287 
4288     public static boolean isValidPackageComponent(PackageManager pm, ComponentName cn) {
4289         if (cn == null) {
4290             return false;
4291         }
4292         if (isPackageDisabled(pm, cn.getPackageName())) {
4293             return false;
4294         }
4295 
4296         try {
4297             // Check the activity
4298             PackageInfo pi = pm.getPackageInfo(cn.getPackageName(), 0);
4299             return (pm.getActivityInfo(cn, 0) != null);
4300         } catch (NameNotFoundException e) {
4301             return false;
4302         }
4303     }
4304 
4305     /**
4306      * Make an ShortcutInfo object for a restored application or shortcut item that points
4307      * to a package that is not yet installed on the system.
4308      */
4309     public ShortcutInfo getRestoredItemInfo(Cursor cursor, int titleIndex) {
4310         final ShortcutInfo info = new ShortcutInfo();
4311         if (cursor != null) {
4312             info.title =  cursor.getString(titleIndex);
4313         } else {
4314             info.title = "";
4315         }
4316         info.setIcon(mIconCache.getIcon(intent, info.title.toString()));
4317         info.itemType = LauncherSettings.Favorites.ITEM_TYPE_SHORTCUT;
4318         return info;
4319     }
4320 
4321     /**
4322      * Make an Intent object for a restored application or shortcut item that points
4323      * to the market page for the item.
4324      */
4325     private Intent getRestoredItemIntent(Cursor c, Context context, Intent intent) {
4326         ComponentName componentName = intent.getComponent();
4327         Intent marketIntent = new Intent(Intent.ACTION_VIEW);
4328         Uri marketUri = new Uri.Builder()
4329                 .scheme("market")
4330                 .authority("details")
4331                 .appendQueryParameter("id", componentName.getPackageName())
4332                 .build();
4333         Log.d(TAG, "manufactured intent uri: " + marketUri.toString());
4334         marketIntent.setData(marketUri);
4335         return marketIntent;
4336     }
4337 
4338     /**
4339      * This is called from the code that adds shortcuts from the intent receiver.  This
4340      * doesn't have a Cursor, but
4341      */
4342     public ShortcutInfo getShortcutInfo(PackageManager manager, Intent intent, Context context) {
4343         return getShortcutInfo(manager, intent, context, null, -1, -1, null);
4344     }
4345 
4346     /**
4347      * Make an ShortcutInfo object for a shortcut that is an application.
4348      *
4349      * If c is not null, then it will be used to fill in missing data like the title and icon.
4350      */
4351     public ShortcutInfo getShortcutInfo(PackageManager manager, Intent intent, Context context,
4352             Cursor c, int iconIndex, int titleIndex, HashMap<Object, CharSequence> labelCache) {
4353         ComponentName componentName = intent.getComponent();
4354         final ShortcutInfo info = new ShortcutInfo();
4355         if (componentName != null && !isValidPackageComponent(manager, componentName)) {
4356             Log.d(TAG, "Invalid package found in getShortcutInfo: " + componentName);
4357             return null;
4358         } else {
4359             try {
4360                 PackageInfo pi = manager.getPackageInfo(componentName.getPackageName(), 0);
4361                 info.initFlagsAndFirstInstallTime(pi);
4362             } catch (NameNotFoundException e) {
4363                 Log.d(TAG, "getPackInfo failed for package " +
4364                         componentName.getPackageName());
4365             }
4366         }
4367 
4368         // TODO: See if the PackageManager knows about this case.  If it doesn't
4369         // then return null & delete this.
4370 
4371         // the resource -- This may implicitly give us back the fallback icon,
4372         // but don't worry about that.  All we're doing with usingFallbackIcon is
4373         // to avoid saving lots of copies of that in the database, and most apps
4374         // have icons anyway.
4375 
4376         // Attempt to use queryIntentActivities to get the ResolveInfo (with IntentFilter info) and
4377         // if that fails, or is ambiguious, fallback to the standard way of getting the resolve info
4378         // via resolveActivity().
4379         Bitmap icon = null;
4380         ResolveInfo resolveInfo = null;
4381         ComponentName oldComponent = intent.getComponent();
4382         Intent newIntent = new Intent(intent.getAction(), null);
4383         newIntent.addCategory(Intent.CATEGORY_LAUNCHER);
4384         newIntent.setPackage(oldComponent.getPackageName());
4385         List<ResolveInfo> infos = manager.queryIntentActivities(newIntent, 0);
4386         for (ResolveInfo i : infos) {
4387             ComponentName cn = new ComponentName(i.activityInfo.packageName,
4388                     i.activityInfo.name);
4389             if (cn.equals(oldComponent)) {
4390                 resolveInfo = i;
4391             }
4392         }
4393         if (resolveInfo == null) {
4394             resolveInfo = manager.resolveActivity(intent, 0);
4395         }
4396         if (resolveInfo != null) {
4397             icon = mIconCache.getIcon(componentName, resolveInfo, labelCache);
4398         }
4399         // the db
4400         if (icon == null) {
4401             if (c != null) {
4402                 icon = getIconFromCursor(c, iconIndex, context);
4403             }
4404         }
4405         // the fallback icon
4406         if (icon == null) {
4407             icon = getFallbackIcon();
4408             info.usingFallbackIcon = true;
4409         }
4410         info.setIcon(icon);
4411 
4412         // from the resource
4413         if (resolveInfo != null) {
4414             ComponentName key = LauncherModel.getComponentNameFromResolveInfo(resolveInfo);
4415             if (labelCache != null && labelCache.containsKey(key)) {
4416                 info.title = labelCache.get(key);
4417             } else {
4418                 info.title = resolveInfo.activityInfo.loadLabel(manager);
4419                 if (labelCache != null) {
4420                     labelCache.put(key, info.title);
4421                 }
4422             }
4423         }
4424         // from the db
4425         if (info.title == null) {
4426             if (c != null) {
4427                 info.title =  c.getString(titleIndex);
4428             }
4429         }
4430         // fall back to the class name of the activity
4431         if (info.title == null) {
4432             info.title = componentName.getClassName();
4433         }
4434         info.itemType = LauncherSettings.Favorites.ITEM_TYPE_APPLICATION;
4435         return info;
4436     }
4437 
4438     static ArrayList<ItemInfo> filterItemInfos(Collection<ItemInfo> infos,
4439             ItemInfoFilter f) {
4440         HashSet<ItemInfo> filtered = new HashSet<ItemInfo>();
4441         for (ItemInfo i : infos) {
4442             if (i instanceof ShortcutInfo) {
4443                 ShortcutInfo info = (ShortcutInfo) i;
4444                 ComponentName cn = info.intent.getComponent();
4445                 if (cn != null && f.filterItem(null, info, cn)) {
4446                     filtered.add(info);
4447                 }
4448             } else if (i instanceof FolderInfo) {
4449                 FolderInfo info = (FolderInfo) i;
4450                 for (ShortcutInfo s : info.contents) {
4451                     ComponentName cn = s.intent.getComponent();
4452                     if (cn != null && f.filterItem(info, s, cn)) {
4453                         filtered.add(s);
4454                     }
4455                 }
4456             } else if (i instanceof LauncherAppWidgetInfo) {
4457                 LauncherAppWidgetInfo info = (LauncherAppWidgetInfo) i;
4458                 ComponentName cn = info.providerName;
4459                 if (cn != null && f.filterItem(null, info, cn)) {
4460                     filtered.add(info);
4461                 }
4462             }
4463         }
4464         return new ArrayList<ItemInfo>(filtered);
4465     }
4466 
4467     private ArrayList<ItemInfo> getItemInfoForPackageName(final String pn) {
4468         ItemInfoFilter filter  = new ItemInfoFilter() {
4469             @Override
4470             public boolean filterItem(ItemInfo parent, ItemInfo info, ComponentName cn) {
4471                 return cn.getPackageName().equals(pn);
4472             }
4473         };
4474         return filterItemInfos(sBgItemsIdMap.values(), filter);
4475     }
4476 
4477     private ArrayList<ItemInfo> getItemInfoForComponentName(final ComponentName cname) {
4478         ItemInfoFilter filter  = new ItemInfoFilter() {
4479             @Override
4480             public boolean filterItem(ItemInfo parent, ItemInfo info, ComponentName cn) {
4481                 return cn.equals(cname);
4482             }
4483         };
4484         return filterItemInfos(sBgItemsIdMap.values(), filter);
4485     }
4486 
4487     public static boolean isShortcutInfoUpdateable(ItemInfo i) {
4488         if (i instanceof ShortcutInfo) {
4489             ShortcutInfo info = (ShortcutInfo) i;
4490             // We need to check for ACTION_MAIN otherwise getComponent() might
4491             // return null for some shortcuts (for instance, for shortcuts to
4492             // web pages.)
4493             Intent intent = info.intent;
4494             ComponentName name = intent.getComponent();
4495             if (info.itemType == LauncherSettings.Favorites.ITEM_TYPE_APPLICATION &&
4496                     Intent.ACTION_MAIN.equals(intent.getAction()) && name != null) {
4497                 return true;
4498             }
4499         }
4500         return false;
4501     }
4502 
4503     /**
4504      * Make an ShortcutInfo object for a shortcut that isn't an application.
4505      */
4506     private ShortcutInfo getShortcutInfo(Cursor c, Context context,
4507             int iconTypeIndex, int iconPackageIndex, int iconResourceIndex, int iconIndex,
4508             int titleIndex) {
4509 
4510         Bitmap icon = null;
4511         final ShortcutInfo info = new ShortcutInfo();
4512         info.itemType = LauncherSettings.Favorites.ITEM_TYPE_SHORTCUT;
4513 
4514         // TODO: If there's an explicit component and we can't install that, delete it.
4515 
4516         info.title = c.getString(titleIndex);
4517 
4518         int iconType = c.getInt(iconTypeIndex);
4519         switch (iconType) {
4520         case LauncherSettings.Favorites.ICON_TYPE_RESOURCE:
4521             String packageName = c.getString(iconPackageIndex);
4522             String resourceName = c.getString(iconResourceIndex);
4523             PackageManager packageManager = context.getPackageManager();
4524             info.customIcon = false;
4525             // the resource
4526             try {
4527                 Resources resources = packageManager.getResourcesForApplication(packageName);
4528                 if (resources != null) {
4529                     final int id = resources.getIdentifier(resourceName, null, null);
4530                     icon = Utilities.createIconBitmap(
4531                             mIconCache.getFullResIcon(resources, id), context);
4532                 }
4533             } catch (Exception e) {
4534                 // drop this.  we have other places to look for icons
4535             }
4536             // the db
4537             if (icon == null) {
4538                 icon = getIconFromCursor(c, iconIndex, context);
4539             }
4540             // the fallback icon
4541             if (icon == null) {
4542                 icon = getFallbackIcon();
4543                 info.usingFallbackIcon = true;
4544             }
4545             break;
4546         case LauncherSettings.Favorites.ICON_TYPE_BITMAP:
4547             icon = getIconFromCursor(c, iconIndex, context);
4548             if (icon == null) {
4549                 icon = getFallbackIcon();
4550                 info.customIcon = false;
4551                 info.usingFallbackIcon = true;
4552             } else {
4553                 info.customIcon = true;
4554             }
4555             break;
4556         default:
4557             icon = getFallbackIcon();
4558             info.usingFallbackIcon = true;
4559             info.customIcon = false;
4560             break;
4561         }
4562         info.setIcon(icon);
4563         return info;
4564     }
4565 
4566     Bitmap getIconFromCursor(Cursor c, int iconIndex, Context context) {
4567         @SuppressWarnings("all") // suppress dead code warning
4568         final boolean debug = false;
4569         if (debug) {
4570             Log.d(TAG, "getIconFromCursor app="
4571                     + c.getString(c.getColumnIndexOrThrow(LauncherSettings.Favorites.TITLE)));
4572         }
4573         byte[] data = c.getBlob(iconIndex);
4574         try {
4575             return Utilities.createIconBitmap(
4576                     BitmapFactory.decodeByteArray(data, 0, data.length), context);
4577         } catch (Exception e) {
4578             return null;
4579         }
4580     }
4581 
4582     ShortcutInfo addShortcut(Context context, Intent data, long container, int screen,
4583             int cellX, int cellY, boolean notify) {
4584         final ShortcutInfo info = infoFromShortcutIntent(context, data, null);
4585         if (info == null) {
4586             return null;
4587         }
4588         addItemToDatabase(context, info, container, screen, cellX, cellY, notify);
4589 
4590         return info;
4591     }
4592 
4593     /**
4594      * Attempts to find an AppWidgetProviderInfo that matches the given component.
4595      */
4596     AppWidgetProviderInfo findAppWidgetProviderInfoWithComponent(Context context,
4597             ComponentName component) {
4598         List<AppWidgetProviderInfo> widgets =
4599             AppWidgetManager.getInstance(context).getInstalledProviders();
4600         for (AppWidgetProviderInfo info : widgets) {
4601             if (info.provider.equals(component)) {
4602                 return info;
4603             }
4604         }
4605         return null;
4606     }
4607 
4608     /**
4609      * Returns a list of all the widgets that can handle configuration with a particular mimeType.
4610      */
4611     List<WidgetMimeTypeHandlerData> resolveWidgetsForMimeType(Context context, String mimeType) {
4612         final PackageManager packageManager = context.getPackageManager();
4613         final List<WidgetMimeTypeHandlerData> supportedConfigurationActivities =
4614             new ArrayList<WidgetMimeTypeHandlerData>();
4615 
4616         final Intent supportsIntent =
4617             new Intent(InstallWidgetReceiver.ACTION_SUPPORTS_CLIPDATA_MIMETYPE);
4618         supportsIntent.setType(mimeType);
4619 
4620         // Create a set of widget configuration components that we can test against
4621         final List<AppWidgetProviderInfo> widgets =
4622             AppWidgetManager.getInstance(context).getInstalledProviders();
4623         final HashMap<ComponentName, AppWidgetProviderInfo> configurationComponentToWidget =
4624             new HashMap<ComponentName, AppWidgetProviderInfo>();
4625         for (AppWidgetProviderInfo info : widgets) {
4626             configurationComponentToWidget.put(info.configure, info);
4627         }
4628 
4629         // Run through each of the intents that can handle this type of clip data, and cross
4630         // reference them with the components that are actual configuration components
4631         final List<ResolveInfo> activities = packageManager.queryIntentActivities(supportsIntent,
4632                 PackageManager.MATCH_DEFAULT_ONLY);
4633         for (ResolveInfo info : activities) {
4634             final ActivityInfo activityInfo = info.activityInfo;
4635             final ComponentName infoComponent = new ComponentName(activityInfo.packageName,
4636                     activityInfo.name);
4637             if (configurationComponentToWidget.containsKey(infoComponent)) {
4638                 supportedConfigurationActivities.add(
4639                         new InstallWidgetReceiver.WidgetMimeTypeHandlerData(info,
4640                                 configurationComponentToWidget.get(infoComponent)));
4641             }
4642         }
4643         return supportedConfigurationActivities;
4644     }

4646     ShortcutInfo infoFromShortcutIntent(Context context, Intent data, Bitmap fallbackIcon) {
4647         Intent intent = data.getParcelableExtra(Intent.EXTRA_SHORTCUT_INTENT);
4648         String name = data.getStringExtra(Intent.EXTRA_SHORTCUT_NAME);
4649         Parcelable bitmap = data.getParcelableExtra(Intent.EXTRA_SHORTCUT_ICON);

4651         if (intent == null) {
4652             // If the intent is null, we can't construct a valid ShortcutInfo, so we return null
4653             Log.e(TAG, "Can't construct ShorcutInfo with null intent");
4654             return null;
4655         }
4656 
4657         Bitmap icon = null;
4658         boolean customIcon = false;
4659         ShortcutIconResource iconResource = null;
4660 
4661         if (bitmap != null && bitmap instanceof Bitmap) {
4662             icon = Utilities.createIconBitmap(new FastBitmapDrawable((Bitmap)bitmap), context);
4663             customIcon = true;
4664         } else {
4665             Parcelable extra = data.getParcelableExtra(Intent.EXTRA_SHORTCUT_ICON_RESOURCE);
4666             if (extra != null && extra instanceof ShortcutIconResource) {
4667                 try {
4668                     iconResource = (ShortcutIconResource) extra;

4671                             iconResource.packageName);
4672                     final int id = resources.getIdentifier(iconResource.resourceName, null, null);
4673                     icon = Utilities.createIconBitmap(
4674                             mIconCache.getFullResIcon(resources, id), context);
4675                 } catch (Exception e) {
4676                     Log.w(TAG, "Could not load shortcut icon: " + extra);

4685                 icon = fallbackIcon;
4686             } else {
4687                 icon = getFallbackIcon();

4689             }
4690         }
4691         info.setIcon(icon);

4694         info.intent = intent;
4695         info.customIcon = customIcon;
4696         info.iconResource = iconResource;

4700 
4701     boolean queueIconToBeChecked(HashMap<Object, byte[]> cache, ShortcutInfo info, Cursor c,
4702             int iconIndex) {
4703         // If apps can't be on SD, don't even bother.
4704         if (!mAppsCanBeOnRemoveableStorage) {
4705             return false;
4706         }
4707         // If this icon doesn't have a custom icon, check to see
4708         // what's stored in the DB, and if it doesn't match what
4709         // we're going to show, store what we are going to show back
4710         // into the DB.  We do this so when we're loading, if the
4711         // package manager can't find an icon (for example because
4712         // the app is on SD) then we can use that instead.
4713         if (!info.customIcon && !info.usingFallbackIcon) {
4714             cache.put(info, c.getBlob(iconIndex));
4715             return true;
4716         }
4717         return false;
4718 =======
4719 >>>>>>> GitAnalyzerPlus_theirs
4720         info.itemType = LauncherSettings.Favorites.ITEM_TYPE_SHORTCUT;
4721         info.promisedIntent = intent;
4722         return info;
4723     }
